description: Hijiri Shimon is a Chuunin from Konohagakure. He is a proctor for the written portion of the Chuunin Exams. In Part II, He, Mozuku, and Tobitake Tonbo assist Yamanaka Inoichi in reading the mind of Yuudachi. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the Animal Path to give Inoichi a chance to analyse what he has learned.
name: Hijiri Shimon
